title: Ulundhu Vithakkaiyile Lyrics Mudhalvan
stanzas:
ulunthu vedhaikaiyile
suthi oodha kaathu adikaiyile
naan appanukku kanji kondu
aathu maedu thaandi ponen
kanda nalla nalla sagunathil
nenjukuli poothu ponen.(2)

rekkapadappil gawuli kaththa
valibu pakkam garudan suththa
theruoram nera kudam paarkavum
mani saththam kaetkavum
aanathe.

oru pookkari edhuka vara
pasum paal maadu kadakkirathe
ini ennaagume yedhagumo
indha sirikki vazhiyil
deivam pugundhu
varam tharumo...

anichcham malar azhage
achu achuvellam pechazhage
en kannukulla koodu katti
kaadhukulla koovum kuyile.
nee etti etti pogaiyile
vittu vittu pogum uyire.(2)

oru thadava iluthu anaichapadi
uyir moocha niruthu kanmaniye
ummudhuga tholaichu veliyera
innum konja irukku ennavane

mazhai adikkum siru pechu
veyil adikkum siru paarvai.
odambu mannu pudhaigira
varaiyil udan vara koodumo.

usur ennodu irukkaiyile
nee mannodu povadhenge
ada un jeevane
inge naanillaiyaa
kolla vandha maranam kooda
kuzhambumaiyaa ..

kurukku siruththavale
enna kungumathil karaichavale
manja thaechi kulikaiyil
enna konjam poosithaaye
kolusukkul maniyaaga
enna konjam maathu thaaye.

oru kannil neer kasiya
udhatu vazhi usur kasiya
unnaala sila murai irakkavum
sila murai pirakkavum aanathe

ada aathoda vilundha ilai
andha aathoda povadhu pol
nenju unnoduthaan pinnoduthe
ada kaalam marandhu
kaattu maramum pookkirathe.

kurukku siruththavale
enna kungumathil karaichavale
manja thaechi kulikaiyil
unna konjam poosuvenyaa
kolusukkul maniyaaga
enna konjam maathuvenyaa.
